Design guide

Description

Use the well as a simple effect on an element to give it an inset effect.

Default well

Look, I'm in a well!

<div class="well">...</div>

Do not use when

Well sizing

Control padding and rounded corners with two optional modifier classes.

Large wells

Look, I'm in a large well!

<div class="well well-lg">...</div>
